Note: Ignore trailing delamination token (e.g., _D2B, _D05, _D11) when evaluating suffix
Delimiter between base SampleID and delamination token
Valid suffix characters on Base-SampleID (X or +)
SampleTypeCode is token index 2 (0..5) in Sample ID split by "_"
SampleNumber(+suffix) is token index 3 in Sample ID split by "_"
